extension.news: [B][COLOR red]Update - v6.1.4 - Aug. 09, 2021[/COLOR][/B] [COLOR yellow]--[/COLOR][I] Fixed playcount module log errors for non Trakt account users.[/I] [COLOR yellow]--[/COLOR][I] Note that a metahandlers update is in the works to fix issues with marking shows, season, episodes for non Trakt account users.[/I] [COLOR yellow]--[/COLOR][I] Added progress bar to trailer playback inside the Trakt Progress Manager xml when playing trailers.[/I] [COLOR yellow]--[/COLOR][I] Fixed library integration issue where meta retrieval from Kodi library failed due to missing "imdb" key in "uniqueid".[/I] [COLOR yellow]--[/COLOR][I] Added new logging for server errors from AllDebrid when down for maintenance.[/I] [COLOR yellow]--[/COLOR][I] Added new [B]"Trakt Popular Lists"[/B] and [B]"Trakt Trending Lists"[/B] to both [B]"Discover Movies"[/B] and [B]"Discover TV Shows"[/B].[/I] [COLOR yellow]--[/COLOR][I] The new lists above now have new context menu options to allow you to [B]Like[/B], or [B]UnLike[/B] a list. If the list is currently [B]Liked[/B] then that will be prepended to the listItem label. There is a new table added to the database to store these liked lists and will update as a service so multi devices will take 15mins to be in sync.[/I] [COLOR yellow]--[/COLOR][I] Added a new sort method for [B]"Collections Sorting"[/B] and can be found in the [B]"General"[/B] category.[/I]
